message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC 

This paper discusses the current state and potential improvements of machine translation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the evaluation of MT output, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also touches on the expected shelf-life of translations, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as well as cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) since it involves the interaction between humans and technology.
